title: Quick Tab slot for global ID
details:
v1.6.3 introduces a `slot` property to QuickTab domain entity for global ID persistence. The slot is a positive integer (1, 2, 3, ...) that uniquely identifies a Quick Tab across all browser tabs.

Key implementation details:
- `slot` property added to QuickTab constructor, serialize(), fromStorage(), and create() methods
- StateManager.assignGlobalSlot() scans all existing slots and returns first available (reuses gaps)
- StateManager.getBySlot(slot) for slot-based lookup
- StateManager.add() and addSilent() auto-assign slots if not provided
- SyncCoordinator._preserveSlot() ensures slot is preserved during cross-tab sync
- Static method StateManager.assignGlobalSlotFromTabs(tabs) for pre-state assignment

This ensures "Quick Tab 1" always refers to the same Quick Tab ID across all browser tabs.
